variable.name: l2.i
variable.comment: Current flowing from pin p to pin n

variable.name: l2.v
variable.comment: Voltage drop of the two pins (= p.v - n.v)

variable.name: cal.inact_fast.tau
variable.comment: time constant for obtaining steady state (i.e. time until difference between n and steady has reduced by a factor of 1/e)

variable.name: cal.inact_fast.steady
variable.comment: value that n would reach if v_gate was held constant

variable.name: cal.inact_fast.n
variable.comment: ratio of molecules in open conformation

variable.name: cal.inact_slow.tau
variable.comment: time constant for obtaining steady state (i.e. time until difference between n and steady has reduced by a factor of 1/e)

variable.name: cal.inact_slow.steady
variable.comment: value that n would reach if v_gate was held constant

variable.name: cal.inact_slow.n
variable.comment: ratio of molecules in open conformation

variable.name: cal.act.tau
variable.comment: time constant for obtaining steady state (i.e. time until difference between n and steady has reduced by a factor of 1/e)

variable.name: cal.act.steady
variable.comment: value that n would reach if v_gate was held constant

variable.name: cal.act.n
variable.comment: ratio of molecules in open conformation

variable.name: cal.trans.rate
variable.comment: rate of change in substance amount

variable.name: ca_ex
variable.comment: extracellular Ca2+ concentration (value not used in this simulation)

variable.name: cal.k_ach
variable.comment: ratio of maximum channel inhibition by acetylcholine

variable.name: l2.use_init
variable.comment: determines whether initial value for v is used

variable.name: vc.stim.i
variable.comment: Current flowing from pin p to pin n

variable.name: vc.stim.v
variable.comment: Voltage between pin p and n (= p.v - n.v) as input signal

variable.name: cal.i
variable.comment: Current flowing from pin p to pin n

variable.name: cal.v
variable.comment: Voltage drop of the two pins (= p.v - n.v)

variable.name: vc.v_stim
variable.comment: input voltage (needs to be defined externally)

variable.name: vc.v
variable.comment: Voltage drop of the two pins (= p.v - n.v)

equations.equation:
vc.g.p.i + vc.i - vc.n.i = 0.0
vc.g.p.i
vc.i
vc.n.i
0.0

l2.i + cal.i_ion - vc.i = 0.0
l2.i
cal.i_ion
vc.i
0.0

vc.n.i + (-l2.i) - cal.i_ion = 0.0
vc.n.i
l2.i
cal.i_ion
0.0

cal.trans.rate = 1.03642695739058e-05 * cal.trans.n * cal.i_ion / /*Real*/(cal.trans.z)
cal.trans.rate
1.03642695739058e-05
cal.trans.n
cal.i_ion
cal.trans.z

der(cal.act.n) = (cal.act.steady - cal.act.n) / cal.act.tau
cal.act.n
cal.act.steady
cal.act.n
cal.act.tau

der(cal.inact_slow.n) = (cal.inact_slow.steady - cal.inact_slow.n) / cal.inact_slow.tau
cal.inact_slow.n
cal.inact_slow.steady
cal.inact_slow.n
cal.inact_slow.tau

der(cal.inact_fast.n) = (cal.inact_fast.steady - cal.inact_fast.n) / cal.inact_fast.tau
cal.inact_fast.n
cal.inact_fast.steady
cal.inact_fast.n
cal.inact_fast.tau

cal.open_ratio = cal.act.n * cal.inact_total * cal.ach_factor
cal.open_ratio
cal.act.n
cal.inact_total
cal.ach_factor

cal.i_open = cal.g_max * (l2.v - cal.v_eq)
cal.i_open
cal.g_max
l2.v
cal.v_eq

cal.i_ion = cal.open_ratio * cal.i_open
cal.i_ion
cal.open_ratio
cal.i_open

der(l2.v) = l2.i / l2.c
l2.v
l2.i
l2.c

cal.g = cal.open_ratio * cal.g_max
cal.g
cal.open_ratio
cal.g_max
